EmailTemplate.subject: Workload Automation for Hybrid Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, How successful is your organization at maximizing the value of your IT investments?
Turbonomic <[[https://www.turbonomic.com]]> delivers Workload AutomationÂ for Hybrid Cloud environments by simultaneously optimizing performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/smart-workload-automation-for-hybrid-cloud-with-turbonomic/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email]]>
Launched in 2010, Turbonomic is one of the world's fastest-growing technology companies and currently helps thousands of enterprises maximize the value of their IT investments.
Please let me know if you would like to learn more about how we can help your organization.
Regards,
Andrew @ Turbonomic
